mapper.insert: insert into cst_customer (cust_no, cust_name, cust_region, cust_manager_id, cust_level, cust_satisfy, cust_credit, cust_addr, cust_zip, cust_tel, cust_fax, cust_website, cust_licence_no, cust_chieftain, cust_bankroll, cust_turnover, cust_bank, cust_bank_account, cust_local_tax_no, cust_national_tax_no, cust_status ) values (#{custNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{custName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{custRegion,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{custManagerId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{custLevel,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{custSatisfy,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{custCredit,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{custAddr,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{custZip,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{custTel,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{custFax,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{custWebsite,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{custLicenceNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{custChieftain,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{custBankroll,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{custTurnover,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{custBank,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{custBankAccount,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{custLocalTaxNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{custNationalTaxNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{custStatus,jdbcType=INTEGER} )

insert into cst_customer
cust_no,
cust_name,
cust_region,
cust_manager_id,
cust_level,
cust_satisfy,
cust_credit,
cust_addr,
cust_zip,
cust_tel,
cust_fax,
cust_website,
cust_licence_no,
cust_chieftain,
cust_bankroll,
cust_turnover,
cust_bank,
cust_bank_account,
cust_local_tax_no,
cust_national_tax_no,
cust_status,
#{custNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{custName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{custRegion,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{custManagerId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
#{custLevel,jdbcType=INTEGER},
#{custSatisfy,jdbcType=INTEGER},
#{custCredit,jdbcType=INTEGER},
#{custAddr,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{custZip,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{custTel,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{custFax,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{custWebsite,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{custLicenceNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{custChieftain,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{custBankroll,jdbcType=BIGINT},
#{custTurnover,jdbcType=BIGINT},
#{custBank,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{custBankAccount,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{custLocalTaxNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{custNationalTaxNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{custStatus,jdbcType=INTEGER},
mapper.select: SELECT c.cust_no,c.cust_name,c.cust_region,c.cust_level, s.usr_name FROM cst_customer c INNER JOIN sys_user s on c.cust_manager_id = s.usr_id
